comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia reports: "He married Gertrude Vanderbilt, a member of the wealthy Vanderbilt family with whom he had three children: Flora Payne Whitney (1897), Cornelius Vanderbilt Whitney (1899), and Barbara Whitney (1903).[1]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Cynthia Wenslow and Harry Angstrom: Thanks for the information. We'll add the full name of Mr. Whitney to the record and may also speculate that the three children shown in the center are the three named in his Wikipedia article.   Thank you!
